plot: Glam to Sham is a clay animated mockumentary oriented around the ever-controversial cosmetics industry. Ex-in-house models Donna, Barbara and Peggy speak out against the Animax Corporation and their illegal testing procedures!
title: Glam to Sham
plot_es: Glam to Sham is a clay animated mockumentary oriented around the ever-controversial cosmetics industry. Ex-in-house models Donna, Barbara and Peggy speak out against the Animax Corporation and their illegal testing procedures!
plot_en: Glam to Sham is a clay animated mockumentary oriented around the ever-controversial cosmetics industry. Ex-in-house models Donna, Barbara and Peggy speak out against the Animax Corporation and their illegal testing procedures!
